ruling: - [[Ninjitsu Art of Transformation]] does not target; you select the monster to Special Summon when you resolve its effect.

- If [[A Legendary Ocean]] is active, your WATER monsters in your hand are lowered by 1 level so if you Special Summon from your hand using [[Ninjitsu Art of Transformation]], you can Summon at 1 level lower (effectively making it Level +4 if looking at the original Level).
